metadata.title: Privacy Policy | GoStudio.ai
metadata.description: Learn how GoStudio.ai protects your privacy and handles your data.
metadata.keywords: privacy policy, data protection, privacy rights, GoStudio.ai privacy, data security

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: This Privacy Policy describes how your personal information is collected, used, and shared when you visit or use our services at GoStudio.ai (the "Site"). This policy is particularly important as we handle image data and provide photo processing services. We are based in Bengaluru, India, and operate in accordance with Indian data protection laws.

personalInfo.title: Personal Information We Collect
personalInfo.content: When you visit the Site, we automatically collect certain information about your device, including:
items: Information about your web browser
IP address
Time zone
Cookies installed on your device
personalInfo.additional: Additionally, as you use the Site, we collect:
additionalItems: Information about the pages you view
How you interact with the Site
Images and photos you upload for processing
Any metadata associated with uploaded images
personalInfo.note: We refer to the automatically-collected information as "Device Information" and the uploaded images and related data as "Image Data."

usage.title: Usage of Personal Information
usage.content: We use the collected information to:
items: Process and enhance your uploaded images
Provide you with the resulting product photos or headshots
Process your payments and provide invoices/confirmations
Communicate with you about your orders and services
Screen for potential risk or fraud
Improve and optimize our Site and services
Analyze how customers use our platform
Assess the success of our marketing campaigns

imageData.title: Image Data Processing
imageData.content: We take special care with your Image Data:
items: Images are processed using secure servers
Original images are retained only for the duration necessary to complete the service
Processed images are stored securely and accessible only to authorized personnel
We implement appropriate technical measures to protect your Image Data
We do not use your images for any purpose other than providing our services unless explicitly authorized

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content: We share your Personal Information with third parties only when necessary:
items: Payment processing partners to handle transactions
Analytics providers to improve our services
Cloud storage providers to securely store and process images
Compliance with applicable laws and regulations
Response to legal requests (subpoenas, court orders, etc.)

storage.title: Data Storage and International Transfers
storage.content: Our primary operations are based in Bengaluru, India. However, we may transfer data internationally to provide our services. When we do so, we ensure appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your information.

rights.title: Your Rights
items: Access your personal information
Correct inaccurate data
Request deletion of your data
Object to our processing of your data
Request data portability
Withdraw consent
